member.name: T:DroneStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of a drone. Position is only set if the drone is active.

member.name: M:DroneStatus.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{Position})
member.summary: Represents the status of a drone. Position is only set if the drone is active.

member.name: T:Position
member.summary: Represents a location. The coordinates must be between -750 and +750.

member.name: M:Position.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Represents a location. The coordinates must be between -750 and +750.
